title: Workshop on Blended Teaching Methods for University Sports Education Based on Outcome-Based Education (OBE)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physical education theories and exercise experience
context.additional_context: A participant-customized educational environment combining theory and practice using digital devices

learning_goals: Participants can explain OBE-based learning goal setting and self-management strategies within one week.
Participants apply integrated sports theory-practice instructional design in blended learning environments with over 80% proficiency.
Participants develop and share a continuous physical activity plan within three months after the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
